title: Use MongoDB in Express Middleware to Store Node.js Website Traffic
description: While I don't really need to store any information about the site, I wanted some MongoDB experience. This middleware allows me to log your info to my database!
content: This was on my second server setup, which was run by Node.js with Express. Now my site runs on a Phoenix (Elixir) backend. <script src="https://gist.github.com/the-mikedavis/b2bfbfb98d4be53c26d77396f8ec392e.js"></script>
